statementlist.statement: select description from event where id = :event_id

select id, school_id, title, short_title, location, allDay, preliminary, start_timestamp, end_timestamp, start_period, end_period, backgroundcolor, bordercolor, textcolor, backgroundrendering from event

insert into event (school_id, title, description, short_title, location, allDay, preliminary, start_timestamp, end_timestamp, start_period, end_period, backgroundColor, borderColor, textColor, backgroundrendering) values (:school_id, :title, :description, :short_title, :location, :allDay, :preliminary, :start, :end, :start_period, :end_period, :backgroundColor, :borderColor, :textColor, :backgroundRendering)

update event set title = :title, description = :description, short_title = :short_title, location = :location, allDay = :allDay, preliminary = :preliminary, start_timestamp = :start, end_timestamp = :end, start_period = :start_period, end_period = :end_period, backgroundcolor = :backgroundColor, bordercolor = :borderColor, textcolor = :textColor, backgroundrendering = :backgroundRendering WHERE id = :id
